issue.title: [CF 879] Trinket: Purified Bindings of Immerseus
issue.body:
What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
V6.2.6

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
When I want to add the trinket Purified Bindings of Immerseus to my buff list it does not show on the suggestions list.  The item id 104924 (which is the trinket id) comes up as Padaren Banquet.


> Posted by CurseForge user Bracye | Imported from CurseForge issue #879 | Raw

comments.body:
If you want to track the buff from a trinket, you need to track it by the name of the buff that you get (or the ID that corresponds to that buff) from that trinket. Spell IDs and item IDs are totally unrelated and are not interchangeable.

Edited Oct 20, 2013

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
